name: safefoodchatbot
0:
”Alexa, open safefood chatbot”
”Alexa, ask safefood chatbot for tips”
”Alexa, ask safefood chatbot how long should i cook my turkey?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: safefood chatbot
des:
Get food safety tips and advice from the safefood chatbot. 

To start, just say "Alexa, launch safefood chatbot"

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
